oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effect of a Monensin Slow-release Capsule at Dry-off on Ketolactia and Milk Yield in Holstein Cows
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Melendez, Pedro
Donovan, Art
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: slow-release capsule
monensin
b-hydroxy butyrate
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study evaluated the effect of a monensin slow-release capsule (RumensinÂ®) given at dry-off on levels of b-hydroxy butyrate in milk at 14 days post-partum and daily milk yield up to 20 days post-partum on Holstein dairy cows.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2002; 196
